alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 9:26PM CDT until April 12 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Neches River Near Town Bluff Mermentau River Near Mermentau Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River Near Town Bluff. * WHEN...From late Sunday night to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 70.0 feet, Flooding can be expected around Barlow Lake and Brushy Lake with some roads being cutoff and some of the lowest properties near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 64.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning to a crest of 68.1 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Neches River Town Bluff 68.0 64.3 Fri 9 pm CDT 66.2 67.8 68.1 &&
